member.name: TF_DA_COLOR
member.summary: The TF_DA_COLOR structure contains color data used in the display attributes for a range of text.

member.name: TF_DA_COLOR.type
member.summary: Specifies the color type as defined in the enumeration.

member.name: TF_DA_COLOR.nIndex
member.summary: Specifies the color as a system color index as defined in . This member is used only if type is equal to TF_CT_SYSCOLOR.

member.name: TF_DA_COLOR.cr
member.summary: Specifies the color as an RGB value. This member is used only if type is equal to TF_CT_COLORREF.
